definition: farad, SI unit of electrical capacitance (loanword)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Faraday (name)/Michael Faraday (1791-1867), British experimental physicist prominent in the development of electricity
Flushing Chinatown, a predominantly Chinese and Korean neighborhood of Queens, New York City

sentences.english: Eric Suen Yiu Wai and Chan Fa La felt embarrassed when they were playing heartbeat measurement.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威和陳法拉玩量度心跳，都感尷尬。

sentences.english: As for the lack of overtaking, the Ferrari man had no miracle solution.
sentences.chinese: 至於缺乏超車，這位法拉利車手沒有什麼好的辦法。

sentences.english: Fiber magnetic field sensor may be achieved by using Faraday magneto optic effect.
sentences.chinese: 利用法拉第磁光效應可以設計光纖磁場傳感器。

sentences.english: On carrying our his experiment, Faraday discovered electromagnetic induction.
sentences.chinese: 在進行實驗時，法拉第發現了電磁感應現象。
分析了法拉第後期做的實驗。

sentences.english: The Rossoneri's club will try to emulate in Japan the feat of the Cavallino.
sentences.chinese: 紅黑軍團也將在日本仿效法拉利一樣獲得成功。

sentences.english: Signing up with Ferrari meant rebuilding my self-confidence in my own potential.
sentences.chinese: 和法拉利簽約意味着在我的潛能中重塑自信。

sentences.english: Eric was very excited to attend the same event with Chan Fa La.
sentences.chinese: 能夠與陳法拉一起出席活動，孫耀威大感興奮。

sentences.english: Now it has few inhabitants besides its garrison.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，除了守備部隊，在法拉只有很少的居民。

sentences.english: Girls enjoy the clean water from the new water points in Tianfala.
sentences.chinese: 姜法拉的一個新取水點，女孩們正在享用清潔的水源。

sentences.english: McBroom, a photographer, snapped the image that made Farrah Fawcett an icon.
sentences.chinese: 一名攝影師，拍下了形象，法拉福西特圖標。

sentences.english: The discovery was foreseen more than 150 years ago by Michael Faraday, the father of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 電學之父法拉第早到150年前就預見了這個發現。

sentences.english: He pointed to a bright red sleekly gleaming Ferrari in the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 他指着停車場上閃亮的，線條優美的紅色法拉利說道。

sentences.english: They laid their objections to paper in a document called the Flushing Remonstrance.
sentences.chinese: 抗議者起草了一份文件，稱爲《法拉盛抗議書》。

sentences.english: But he confessed to being shocked at the break-neck pace of games in the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的比賽速度都是法拉利的速度。

definition: Elizabeth/also written 伊麗莎白|伊丽莎白
Barth or Barthes (name)/Roland Barthes (1915-1980), French critic and semiotician
Arnold (name)/refers to Arnold Schwarzenegger 阿諾·施瓦辛格|阿诺·施瓦辛格[A1 nuo4 · Shi1 wa3 xin1 ge2]
Bia, daughter of Pallas and Styx in Greek mythology, personification of violence
Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
